channel.title: User Guide - Tools on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in User Guide - Tools on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: modelc
item.description: modelc Run the model loader and executer. Synopsis # Load and run a Model, specifying the Model, Stack and SignalGroup YAML files. $ dse.modelc --logger 2 --name binary_model_instance model.yaml stack.yaml signal_group.yaml Options $ dse.modelc ModelC - model runner usage: [--transport <transport>] [--uri <endpoint>] (i.e. redis://localhost:6379) [--host <host url>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--port <port number>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--stepsize <double>] [--endtime <double>] [--uid <model uid>] [--name <model name>] *** normally required *** [--timeout <double>] [--logger <number>] 0.

item.title: mstep
item.description: mstep Debug tool to load and step a model through a simulation. Synopsis # Load and step a Model, specifying the Model, Stack and SignalGroup YAML files. $ dse.mstep --logger 2 --name binary_model_instance model.yaml stack.yaml signal_group.yaml Options $ mstep --help Model Loader and Stepper usage: [--transport <transport>] [--uri <endpoint>] (i.e. redis://localhost:6379) [--host <host url>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--port <port number>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--stepsize <double>] [--endtime <double>] [--uid <model uid>] [--name <model name>] *** normally required *** [--timeout <double>] [--logger <number>] 0.

item.title: simbus
item.description: simbus Run the SimBus. Synopsis # Run the SimBus, specifying the Stack YAML file. $ dse.simbus --logger 2 --timeout 1 stack.yaml Options $ simbus --help Standalone SimBus usage: [--transport <transport>] [--uri <endpoint>] (i.e. redis://localhost:6379) [--host <host url>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--port <port number>] *** depreciated, use --uri *** [--stepsize <double>] [--endtime <double>] [--uid <model uid>] [--name <model name>] *** normally required *** [--timeout <double>] [--logger <number>] 0..6 *** 0=more, 6=less, 3=INFO *** [--file <model file>] [--path <path to model>] *** relative path to Model Package *** [YAML FILE [,YAML FILE] .
